1. Google tests AI to detect scam phone calls. Privacy advocates are terrified.  Yahoo! Voices
  2. Google's scam detection AI phone tests alarm privacy advocates  NBC News
  3. Android's AI era includes eavesdropping on phone calls, warning you about scams  Ars Technica
  4. Android is getting an AI-powered scam call detection feature  The Verge
  5. Google's Newest AI Can Listen in on Calls to Detect Scammers  Inc.
